EmailTemplate.name: Master Investigation Closure Email Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Master Investigation {!CMPL123CME__Investigation__c.Investigation_Evaluation_Number__c} has been {!CMPL123CME__Investigation_Template__c.CMPL123CME__CMPL123_WF_Status__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The Master Investigation {!CMPL123CME__Investigation__c.Investigation_Evaluation_Number__c} has been {!CMPL123CME__Investigation__c.CMPL123_WF_Status__c}. You are the owner of one of its Related Investigation.
